attributes.action: exempt the Catholic adoption agencies from the new gay law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Catholics of the UK must unite and let the British government know that we do not believe it is right and just for the Catholic adoption agencies to be forced to accept new legislation which does not agree with their catholic beliefs, with regard to gay couples being allowed to adopt children.

rejection.details:
There are already lots of petitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=adopt
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
